question: What is the new official name of the Mars 2020 rover of NASA?
explanation:
National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) has announced that the official name of its Mars 2020 rover will be \'Perseverance.\'
From the nation-wide contest for selecting the roverâ€™s name, the entry of a seventh-grade school student, Alexander Mather was finalised. The rover is a robotic scientist and its mission includes searching for signs of past microbial life and illustrating the red planet\'s climate and geology.
